message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IT, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper discusses edge preserving filters and their applications in computer vision and computational photography, which are both subfields of computer science. The focus on image processing and noise reduction suggests that cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The mention of mathematical analysis and efficient implementation suggests cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.MM (Multimedia) as possible sub-categories. The mention of hardware realization suggests cs.SI (Systems and Control) as another possible sub-category. Finally, the mention of boundaries and spikes suggests cs.GR (Graphics) as a possible sub-category.
